Blog.post: Haha yeahh well we went to the whitehurst pool opoening, but we never went swimming, we mostly hung out with molly and john, collin, ryan, and some other random kids. IT was pretty cool after we went back to nicks house and played halo.! :-D It was fun we played MANHUNT and i didnt really win b/c i was wearing a WHITE shirt that gave me away even in the dark. We also hid in poison sumac Ughh luckily i showered right when i got hoome and got it all off? Yeah if you cant tell im having alot of fun with HTML

Wooooo its saturday, i just finished my 50 notecards!! :-D How schweet is that!? For debate of course, were debating renewable energy sources! Did you know that if 1% of the worlds deserts were coverd with solar panels they would create more energy than all of the burning of the fossil fuels that occurs world wide in one year?? Or that every year the US spends 500 billion on energy, 20 billion alone on buying oil from overseas!? Or that in 1996 over 57 million tons of materials were recycled? And These 57 million tons saved enough energy to power over 4 million houses with energy for a year!!! Hahah ok enough of my eco-sensitive ranting! Im gonna go get ready to nadamos con nick y stu a el gran festival cierre del piscina whitehurst. Voy a completar mi debata a un otra dia Adios

Aye carumba! IM SICK!! :-( And erika is gone for the weekend to lake george...WHERE I WANT TO BE! My aunt and uncle own a camp up on lake champlain and i went there alll the time when i was younger, but now i miss it alott! Anyways im home sick with a sinus infection and a fever :-( Yuck anyways i think its nap time. Adios
RaZberrieS46: JIM AND ERIKA ARE HOT!

I LOVE THE HSA'S!!!!! We get to sleep in 3 hours, and then have TWO classes a day, slightly shortened....Its alot of fun, and the classes are very hectic! Its amazing! And if you have A lunch you can sneak in around 11 and no problemo. Oh well the 24 season finale is on! bye

Ok well ill start out on friday. Friday: Me and nick went swimming with erika and brooke, it was pretty awesome! After the adventure of them trying to get changed in the bathroom with all of the bugs But the swimming was awesome , and i hope they come again sometime!!! On the way to the beach we saw an ALMOST-fight....that was cool...Yeah but we swam over to the spit, and just sat and talked for a while. Then nick threw an old rusty beer can at me, and i blocked it, but it caught on my finger and took 2 nice chunks out of my finger pad...Looked bad, but didnt really hurt all that much. Then brookes step-dad came and took them away, so me and nick came back to my house and whipped out some GTA: Vice CITY! Saturday: Got up at about 8;30 sharp... Hah about 8;30 sharp...it doesnt make sense! but anyways, i mowed the back yard, and worked on the pool some. Then i went for a run, sprinted down to 7-11 from my house, stoped bought a slurpy and WALKED home!! Yeah, that was my kinda run. Anyways i dont remember what happened alot of the day, but then at my sisters play i saw alot of people i knew! First i helped jen and hannah with some ladder, and suzie was there, and so was ally! So i talked to them all alot.. But then about 1/2 through the show i went backstage and found ally, so then we talked for liek an hour and a half. And THEN i went to get some gelato (after the show was over) and came back like 30 mins later to find ally STILL There! lol her parents were at a crokket party and hadnt come yet, so i talked to her for a while more, and then went home. Sunday: HOMEWORK all day...Oh and i mowed the lawn and worked on the pool....And talked to people on the computer, but nothing eventfull... Oh well tomorrow is the MSA's for geometry, and after that i get to sleep in for the rest of the week! Rating- Overall a pretty awesome weekend id give it a B+ Highlight- DEFINATELY swimming with brooke and erika!!!!
So yeah i just made this so i could make fun of erika in HER blog...but who knows i MIGHT use it...
SUMMER TIME SUMMER TIME SUMMER TIME SUMMER TIME SUMMERS HERE!!!!
Only 8 finals seperating me from freedom!!!!

Ok well everybody, it is tempting to upload all of these pictures onto here, with this new photoblogger software..BUT most of my pics are already on http://img78.photobucket.com/albums/v241/ToastedAmigos/?
Everythings big and red....LOL Like clifford :-D
I GOT A WHITE MINI IPOD AND IT KICKS ASS!!!!!
Wow my new bike is the pimp'ador of the biking universe. Me stupak and jajo biked the BWI loop yesterday, 35+miles...it was awesome.. I gotta go run, Jim
